Body: BackgroundRecently my phone got stolen from my pocket and then I was almost thrown in street and run over by a car. The police won't move a finger because of a new law, which means I'll have to wait for over a year to get it back, but of course I did file a complaint with all the documents regarding the ownership of the phone.QuestionIs there any possibility of tracking your phone considering the fact that you have no pre-installed or rooted app and even if you do have it they can do factory reset/boot or do a full wipe? Can you track your IMEI or is there a service that could track it for you?
Title: A miracle for finding a stolen phone

history.Text: Recently my phone got stolen from my pocket and then I always was thrown in street and ran over by a car because of it. Unfortunately, the police won't move a finger because of a new law, which means I'll have to wait for over a year to get it back, but of course I did file a complaint with all the documents regarding the ownership of the phone. Therefor is there any possibility of tracking your phone considering the fact that you have no pre-installed or rooted app and even if you do have it they can do factory reset/boot or do a full whipe. Can you track your IMEI or is there an awesome nerd that could do that?
A miracle for finding a stolen phone

history.Comment: fix spelling and make it a little less insulting ('nerd' is an insult to many).

Can you track your IMEI or is there a service that could track it for you?
